name: Tap Ball Escape
description:
Tap Ball Escape is very addictive game to play. Tap Ball Escape is real fun to play. Tap Ball Escape is short arcade game which will keep you busy in tap shoot. In Tap Ball Escape you need to keep clam and tap on screen to shoot out the ball from gaps. Try to make maximum ball escapes by taping on screen in time to shoot the ball. If you make it through you will get points, otherwise game over.

Just Stay Focused and Keep Yourself Calm to play this crazy addictive game.
